addons.description: A total conversion for lite-xl that transforms lite-xl into a word-processor like text-editor for creative writing.
Displays the time of your current session, and active time of your current session in the status bar.
Checks for words as you type, and replaces them with other words, based on a list you provide.
A word-like color scheme, designed to be used for creative-writing of markdown files. Part of the write-xl project.
A plugin used to navigate through, and parse chapter information in creative writing markdown files. Part of the write-xl project.
A simple git plugin that allows for easy fetch/save of repos anchored at the project root. Part of the write-xl project.
A plugin similar to spellcheck which uses a thesaurus to provide alternate words. Part of the write-xl project.
Provides automatic shortcuts, and a toolbar to manage the formatting of a markdown docview. Part of the write-xl project.
